scripts.dev: npm run watch; npm run server
scripts.watch: watchify -t reactify public/js/app.js -o public/js/bundle.js --verbose & node watch-less.js public/css/style.less
scripts.prod: browserify -t reactify public/js/app.js -o public/js/bundle.js --verbose && uglifyjs public/js/bundle.js -o public/js/bundle.js && lessc public/css/style.less | cleancss -o public/css/style.css
